name: Headbutts of Fury
description:
Please use fullscreen!!!!!!!!

DISCLAIMER - PLEASE READ BELOW

This game was made in three continuous hours by a new Unity user as a challenge. This is why bugs and unbalanced gameplay was left in the game. Please do not be too harsh on the game,  however, constructive criticism is still allowed.

Description and How to Play:

Headbutts of Fury is a fast paced survival game in which the player must kill the flying goblins that attack them. You must use your head to slam into enemies, and you are damaged when your main body is hit. Every time you click, a goblin will spawn. As the game progresses, more goblins will spawn per click.

Controls:

Mouse clicks launch you in the opposite direction of your mouse position

Hitting your head against a goblin kills them.
